title: Looking for dedicated players for a serious team.
body:
I am looking for players who are serious about the game and want to improve individually and as a team.

We expect to play 7 days a week around 4pm+

IGN: whitepumah

replies.body: Can you please let us know the highest rank your current members have achieved
If that is relevant for you then this team is not for you.
im open to learn and get better both at an individual level and team level
hey i would like to join ..i invited you on league
I would love a chance to join, I am Gold 4 currently and my IGN is ' Sir Jazza '
